description.value:
Frequency once per round

Effect The dragon hurls a fragment of its horn at a target within 40 feet. The target takes the same damage as the dragon's horn Strike and must attempt a @Check[reflex|options:damaging-effect,inflicts:immobilized] save.

Critical Success The target takes no damage.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] as the horn fragment pins them to the nearest surface.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target takes double damage and @Damage[2d6[persistent,bleed]] damage as the fragment pierces their body.
